name: ITP - G1202B - Waikare Riverbend SH38 - Network Drainage
template name: ITP - G1202B - Waikare Riverbend SH38 - Network Drainage

name: 1 - Locate existing services by hand digging/hydro excavation
Detail - Ensure all services conflicting with the line of trench has been exposed by hand digging/ hydro excavation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Potholing
Conformance Criteria - All conflicts have been located. New services and/or conflicts to be advised to Project Engineer. As-built all services
Detail - Inspect trench profile and ensure it is correct to minimum drainage standards
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Line and level is correct
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Detail - Ensure trench width is sufficient to provide enough space on either side of the pipe
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - D/6 or 150mm whichever is greater on either side of the pipe
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Detail - Test formation level on completion of excavation to check if undercut required
Frequency - One test per 20 linear metres
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Scala Penetrometer
Conformance Criteria - If CBR is less than 50kPa , advise Engineer
Detail - Material to meet specifications dependant on material type selected
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Detail - Bedding - Ensure correct thickness of bedding is placed and compacted
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - 150 mm thick bedding for all mm dia pipe
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Detail - Confirm pipes diameter, class & jointing type as shown on the drawings, and that the pipes are correct and in good condition.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Pipe - Diameter & Class, Wingwalls, Manholes, Cesspits etc.
Detail - Pipe Laying - as only replacing section on outlet of existing pipe, grade is to follow existing levels
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Invert level following pre-existing grade
Detail - Inspect pipes prior to backfilling to ensure they have been installed correctly and the joints are in place. Check for gaps and/or defects and check pipe alignment for straightness
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual/Inspection
Conformance Criteria - No defects/ gaps / pipes are aligned correctly
Detail - Material to meet specifications dependant on material type selected
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Compliance with requirements from Specifications
Records - CS-4025 Drainage Line Record Check Sheet
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - CLEAN GRADED GRANULAR AGGREGATE AND HAVE BROKEN FACES AP65

Detail - Backfill 150mm lifts with (material) and test every 300mm lift to underside of Subgrade alternatively, to 300mm above crown of pipe in berms. Remainder of backfill to be done with excavated material.
Frequency - 1 test per 20 m length of trench per 300mm lift
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Testing
Conformance Criteria - 97% (under carriageway) or 95% (under berm) of MDD or Clegg equivalent
Records - Clegg or NDM Test Results
Detail - Red line mark up drawings to be reviewed and accepted. All NCRs and RFIs are closed and included with Handover QA file.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
15 - Completion Sign Off From Fields Below
